overview: Nakamura Rui' is the editor-in-chief and managing director of a well-known publishing company. Although she has a history of failed marriages in the past and a crooked son, she is nonetheless a career woman who thrives in the industry with quick judgment. Then one day, 'Nakamura Rui' meets 'Suzuki Kou', who is 17 years younger than him, and falls in love with her. But the problem is that he is a married man who is already married to another woman. As their meeting deepens, their love begins to run toward ruin... .
title: Second Virgin
